title: President to hold Another Office Act, 2004
title_en: President to hold Another Office Act, 2004
description: Official consolidated text of President to hold Another Office Act, 2004 (VII of 2004) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement
provisions.content:
_ (1) This Act may be called the President to
Hold Another Office Act, 2004.
(2)     It extends to the whole of Pakistan.
(3)     It shall come into force on the 31st December, 2004.

provisions.title: Section 2. Holder of another office. The holder of the office of the President of Pakistan may, in
provisions.content:
addition to his office, hold the office of the Chief of the Army Staff which is hereby declared not to
disqualify its holder as provided under paragraph (d) of clause (1) of Article 63 read with proviso to
paragraph (b) of clause (7) of Article 41 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan or
any other law for the time being in force or any judgment of any court or tribunal:
Provided that this provision shall be valid only for the present holder of the office of the
President.
____________
